```{r}

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

kickers <- read_csv("kickers_v2.csv",
                    col_types = cols(...1 = col_double(),
                                     Team = col_character(),
                                     Year = col_double(),
                                     GameMinute = col_double(), 
                                     Kicker = col_character(),
                                     Distance = col_double(), 
                                     ScoreDiff = col_double(), 
                                     Grass = col_logical(), 
                                     Success = col_double())) %>%
  rename(., "ID" = "...1") %>%
  mutate(Grass = if_else(Grass == TRUE, 1, 0))

```
